list.name: infobase
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT infobase_name FROM logs.event_log WHERE infobase_name != '' ORDER BY infobase_name

list.name: user
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT user_name FROM logs.event_log WHERE user_name != '' ORDER BY user_name

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  toDateTime(intDiv(toUInt32(event_time), 300) * 300) AS time,
  level,
  count() AS count
FROM logs.event_log
WHERE $__timeFilter(event_time)
  AND ('$__all' IN ($infobase) OR infobase_name IN ($infobase))
GROUP BY time, level
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  toDateTime(intDiv(toUInt32(event_time), 300) * 300) AS time,
  user_name AS user,
  count() AS count
FROM logs.event_log
WHERE $__timeFilter(event_time)
  AND ('$__all' IN ($infobase) OR infobase_name IN ($infobase))
  AND ('$__all' IN ($user) OR user_name IN ($user))
  AND user_name != ''
GROUP BY time, user
ORDER BY time, count DESC
LIMIT 10

SELECT
  user_name AS user,
  count() AS event_count
FROM logs.event_log
WHERE $__timeFilter(event_time)
  AND ('$__all' IN ($infobase) OR infobase_name IN ($infobase))
  AND user_name != ''
GROUP BY user
ORDER BY event_count DESC
LIMIT 10

SELECT
  event_presentation AS event,
  count() AS count
FROM logs.event_log
WHERE $__timeFilter(event_time)
  AND ('$__all' IN ($infobase) OR infobase_name IN ($infobase))
GROUP BY event
ORDER BY count DESC
LIMIT 15

panels.title: Events List (Enriched with User & Metadata Names)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  event_time AS "Дата, время",
  infobase_name AS "Информационная база",
  user_name AS "Пользователь",
  computer AS "Компьютер",
  application_presentation AS "Приложение",
  event_presentation AS "Событие",
  CASE
    WHEN metadata_presentation != '' THEN metadata_presentation
    ELSE metadata_name
  END AS "Метаданные",
  comment AS "Комментарий",
  transaction_status AS "Статус транзакции"
FROM logs.event_log
WHERE $__timeFilter(event_time)
  AND ('$__all' IN ($infobase) OR infobase_name IN ($infobase))
  AND ('$__all' IN ($user) OR user_name IN ($user))
ORDER BY event_time DESC
LIMIT 1000

SELECT
  toDateTime(intDiv(toUInt32(event_time), 3600) * 3600) AS time,
  user_name AS user,
  count() AS count
FROM logs.event_log
WHERE $__timeFilter(event_time)
  AND ('$__all' IN ($infobase) OR infobase_name IN ($infobase))
  AND user_name != ''
GROUP BY time, user
ORDER BY time
